creator: dims@yahoo.com
text:
Jikes has been supporting -bootclasspath for a while now. Can we please update
org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.compilers.Jikes.java and enable -bootclasspath
when invoking jikes.exe.

Thanks,
dims

creator: dims@yahoo.com
text:
This will enable Kaffe to build xalan project in Gump which will increase the %
of projects getting built.

thanks,
dims

A workaround may be to set the BOOTCLASSPATH environment variable in the env var
script for kaffe on brutus. As far as I can tell from bootstrapping ant with
Kaffe/Jikes on my Mandrake box, jikes will use the content of that envirnment
variable for the boot class path if none is specified.

That doesn't fix the bug in ant, but may help us get a bit further on brutus.

cheers,
dalibor topic
